title: Blackberry and Peach Pie with Polenta Pastry
ingredients: ['Pastry', '140g softened butter', '150g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 egg yolks', '210g plain flour', '55g cornmeal (polenta)', 'pinch of salt', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon cornmeal (polenta)', '250g fresh or frozen blackberries', '1 small tin (200g) peaches, sliced', '4 tablespoons cane sugar', '1 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons milk']
